title: Travel Lighter To Go Further - Samsonite
description:
What does it mean to travel? To discover, to go the extra mile, to chart the uncharted, to go further, always further. In those exotic places we can create new memories. However short the moments, however light they may be, they will remain in our minds forever.
The lighter you travel, the further you can go… and the more you can bring back.

asset.author: SamsoniteEurope
asset.hookText: What does it mean to travel? To discover, to go the extra mile, to chart the uncharted, to go further, always further. In those exotic places we can create new ...

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING] How much does a sunset weigh? How light is an emotion, the sudden feeling of freedom? What's the weight of a memory? 

Just instants, so light, yet so intense they stay in your mind forever. The more memories you want to keep, the lighter you need to be. And you, how far would you go? Travel lighter to go further, with Samsonite.
